expenditures.Entity Name: Montana Citizens for Right to Work
expenditures.Purpose: production and postage for lobbying mailing
expenditures.Expenditure Paid Communications Subject: Lobbying communication to report our survey results and ask supporters to urge the following candidates to support Right to Work; Casey Knudsen, Joyce Stone, Jim Johnson, Bob Phalen, Charles J. Peterson Jr., Jason Stuart, Randy Chamberlin, Jane Gillette, Josh Seckinger, Brian Gabriel Popiel, Kenneth M. Walsh, Cindy Younkin, Ian Root, Greg Devries, Marta Bertoglio, Bryher Herak, Sashin Hume, Ron Marshall, Jolena Bugli, Laura Merrill, Walt Sales, Gary Perry and Debra Brown.
